title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
text: The Fellowship of the Ring is the first volume of the epic high fantasy novel The Lord of the Rings. It begins with the events of the first novel, The Hobbit, and follows the adventures of the hobbit Frodo Baggins and his companions, including Gandalf the Grey, Saruman, and the Ents. The story of the Lord of the Rings is told by the wizard Gandalf and his companions, the Fellowship of the Ring, who are called to destroy the One Ring, which is made of a single, large crystal.
